welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Octeville, known for its beautiful beaches and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to discover all the wonders this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Maupertus Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at The Blaye Airport serves all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at The Blaye Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.
